scripts.build: tailwind build ./src/styles/tailwind.css -c ./tailwind.config.js -o ./src/static/tailwind.css && purgecss -c purgecss.config.js -o ./src/static && gatsby build
scripts.deploy: tailwind build ./src/styles/tailwind.css -c ./tailwind.config.js -o ./src/static/tailwind.css && purgecss -c purgecss.config.js -o ./src/static && gatsby build && gh-pages -d public
